title: TrueColorsBby
author: TrueColorsBby
content: So who would you say are the most influential figures in the history of crypto? I'll add my list below which is not ranked in any particular order. What do you think about my list? Anyone you would leave out or add? What is your list? - Satoshi, Bitcoin- Adam Back, Bitcoin- Vitalik Buterin, Ethereum- Jae Kwon, Cosmos- Ethan Buchman, Cosmos- CZ, Binance- David Chaum- Nick Zsabo- Gavin Andresen, Bitcoin- Sunny King, peercoin (first pos coin)- Vincent Durham, namecoin (first top level domain coin)- Hal Finney, first bitcoin recipient and early contributor- Ralph Merkle, merkle tree inventor- Wei Dai, lot of stuff- Pieter Wuille, bitcoin core dev- Andre Cronje, Yearn- Fluffypony, Monero- Charles Hoskinson, Cardano- Emin Gun Sirer, Avalanche- Roger Ver, Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin- Joseph Lubin, cofounder Ethereum- Gavin Wood, Polkadot- Sergey Bazarov, Link- Charlie Lee, Litecoin- Hayden Adams, Uniswap

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: Since we're talking about cryptocurrency's history, I'd rather focus on those who really paved the way for the creation of Bitcoin. The cypherpunks should be given due credit. They're the ones who made the earliest steps which Satoshi made use of. I guess it would also be good if we include Laszlo Hanyecz since he was the first man to spend Bitcoin on something. I wouldn't be giving too much credit to those who came into the scene with no other thing in mind than make profit. They're nothing but selfish individuals.
